T02TD3422E:85b-3: rdo rje chos kyi sgrub thabs /
T02TD3422E:85b-4: rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3422E:85b-5: hr'i:yig ye shes rdzogs pa las //
T02TD3422E:85b-6: h'a la h'a la'i sku chen po //
T02TD3422E:85b-7: zhal gsum spyan yang gsum pa ste //
T02TD3422E:85b-8: ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing //
T02TD3422E:85b-9: zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha //
T02TD3422E:85b-10: dbu la thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD3422E:85b-11: ral pa'i nang nas rgyal ba'i sku //
T02TD3422E:85b-12: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan gyur pa //
T02TD3422E:85b-13: chu skyes dkar po dang mtshungs shing //
T02TD3422E:85b-14: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
T02TD3422E:85b-15: phyag drug zhal ni 'dzum pa dang //
T02TD3422E:85b-16: stag gi pags pa'i na bzar bcas //
T02TD3422E:85b-17: phyag g-yas na ni mchog sbyin dang //
T02TD3422E:85b-18: gnyis pa na ni bgrang phreng dang //
T02TD3422E:85b-19: gsum pa mnga' dang gar mdzad do //
T02TD3422E:85b-20: g-yon pa na ni padmas brgyan //
T02TD3422E:85b-21: gnyis pa de bzhin nu ma 'dzin //
T02TD3422E:85b-22: gsum pa la ni de bzhin gzhu //
T02TD3422E:85b-23: sprul gyis yongs su dkris pa yi //
T02TD3422E:85b-24: rtse gsum g-yas kyi phyogs su'o //
T02TD3422E:85b-25: me tog dri bzangs sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD3422E:85b-26: gang ba'i thod pa g-yon phyogs su //
T02TD3422E:85b-27: padma dmar po'i steng du ni //
T02TD3422E:85b-28: rol pa'i stabs kyis yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD3422E:85b-29: rin chen ri bo'i phug mthar gnas //
T02TD3422E:85b-30: rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom par bya //
T02TD3422E:85b-31: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD3422E:85b-32: sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku spros te //
T02TD3422E:85b-33: rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD3422E:85b-34: zas rnams kun la longs spyod cing //
T02TD3422E:85b-35: bsgom pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD3422E:85b-36: rang gis gsang sngags bzlas par bya //
T02TD3422E:85b-37: bla na med pa'i byang chub ni //
T02TD3422E:85b-38: myur du thob cing bde bar 'jug / h'a la h'a la yongs mnyes pas //
T02TD3422E:85b-40: rdo rje zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD3422E:85b-41: snying gar hr'i:yig zla steng dgod //
T02TD3422E:85b-42: chos rnams bdag med bsgom byas la //
T02TD3422E:86a-2: yang dag 'phro ba mkha' mnyam de //
T02TD3422E:86a-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par blta //
T02TD3422E:86a-4: brtan dang g-yo ba'i 'gro ba rnams //
T02TD3422E:86a-5: yang dag byang chub sems dpa'i don //
T02TD3422E:86a-6: bskyed cing snying gar rab tu zhugs //
T02TD3422E:86a-8: skad cig gis ni ye shes sbyor //
T02TD3422E:86a-9: de la kha dog dkar dang dmar //
T02TD3422E:86a-11: sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can //
T02TD3422E:86a-12: rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pa //
T02TD3422E:86a-13: phyag g-yon padma sdong bur bcas //
T02TD3422E:86a-14: 'dab ma bcu drug pa dag bsnams //
T02TD3422E:86a-15: de la phyag g-yas kyis kyang ni //
T02TD3422E:86a-17: rma bya'i steng du zla ba yi //
T02TD3422E:86a-18: dkyil 'khor dbus su nye bar bzhugs //
T02TD3422E:86a-19: sems dpa'i skyil krung kun nas 'khyil //
T02TD3422E:86a-20: sgeg pa'i nyams dang bcas shing bsten //
T02TD3422E:86a-21: las chen mchod rten nang gnas pa'i //
T02TD3422E:86a-22: gzhal yas khang gi spyod lam can //
T02TD3422E:86a-23: rtag tu rdo rje'i chos mchog ni //
T02TD3422E:86a-24: bsgom byas byang chung thob par 'gyur //
T02TD3422E:86a-25: bsgoms pas ngal na snying gar zla ba la sngags bkod la phreng ba'i rnam pa bzhin du mi g-yo ba'i sems kyis bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD3422E:86a-26: de la bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di'o //
T02TD3422E:86a-28: rdo rje chos kyi sgrub thabs cho ga bsdus pa rdzogs so /
